statements: SELECT * FROM image_vectors;
SELECT image_id FROM image_vectors ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT vector FROM image_vectors WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM image_vectors WHERE vector IS NOT NULL;
SELECT image_id, vector FROM image_vectors LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM image_vectors WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT image_id, vector FROM image_vectors WHERE image_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000')
SELECT * FROM image_vectors ORDER BY image_id DESC
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(vector)) AS avg_vector_length FROM image_vectors
SELECT image_id, COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM image_vectors GROUP BY image_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM feature_vectors
SELECT * FROM image_clusters ORDER BY cluster_id DESC
SELECT cluster_name, image_ids FROM image_clusters WHERE cluster_name = 'Cluster A'
SELECT image_id FROM feature_vectors WHERE image_id > 100 ORDER BY image_id ASC
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(feature_vector)) AS average_length FROM feature_vectors
SELECT * FROM feature_vectors ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT image_id, SUM(feature_vector[1]) AS total_feature_vector FROM feature_vectors GROUP BY image_id HAVING total_feature_vector > 50
SELECT * FROM feature_vectors WHERE image_id IN (SELECT image_id FROM image_clusters WHERE cluster_id = 1)
SELECT AVG(feature_vector[1]) AS average_feature_value FROM feature_vectors
SELECT * FROM image_clusters WHERE cluster_name LIKE 'Cluster A%'
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatureVectors
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatureVectors
SELECT similar_images FROM ImageSimilaritySearch WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT * FROM ImageClustering ORDER BY cluster_id ASC
SELECT cluster_id, image_ids FROM ImageClustering WHERE cluster_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003'
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatureVectors WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatureVectors WHERE feature_vector = DECODE('010101010101', 'hex');
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatureVectors WHERE image_id IN (SELECT image_id FROM ImageSimilaritySearch WHERE similar_images @> ARRAY['123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000']);
SELECT cluster_id, image_ids FROM ImageClustering WHERE cluster_id = '1a30baff-1efc-4dbe-9d70-800df558f6f7';
SELECT cluster_id, image_ids FROM ImageClustering WHERE image_ids @> ARRAY['123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000']::UUID[];
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatureVectors;
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatureVectors ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE upload_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT pair_id, image_id_1, image_id_2, similarity_score FROM ImageSimilarityPairs WHERE similarity_score > 0.9 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImageClusters WHERE cluster_name LIKE 'Cluster%';
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatureVectors;
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatureVectors ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM ImageMetadata WHERE upload_timestamp > '2022-01-01' LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_id_1, image_id_2, similarity_score FROM ImageSimilarityPairs WHERE similarity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT cluster_id, cluster_name, cluster_center_id FROM ImageClusters WHERE cluster_name LIKE '%landmark%' ORDER BY cluster_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatureVectors;
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatureVectors;
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_url FROM ImageMetaData;
SELECT algorithm_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM ClusteringAlgorithmParams;
SELECT similar_image_id, similarity_score FROM SimilaritySearchResults;
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatureVectors WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT result_id, query_image_id, similar_image_id, similarity_score FROM SimilaritySearchResults WHERE similarity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT cluster_id, image_id FROM ClusterAssignments WHERE cluster_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT algorithm_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM ClusteringAlgorithmParams WHERE algorithm_name = 'KMeans' AND parameter_name = 'n_clusters';
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_url FROM ImageMetaData WHERE image_url LIKE '%.jpg' ORDER BY image_name ASC;
